txt.en: 'What makes you hesitate, [placeholder]? Is there something you have not told me?'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>NOTE: Accepting and completing this quest will reveal the truth of Inhild's actions to her father. You will not be allowed to complete the quest 'Inhild's Wish' to deceive Hwitmon.</rgb>

You explain to Hwitmon that Randgar feigned his death as part of a scheme to run off with Inhild, because the two were in love.

'This is intolerable, [placeholder]! How dare they? That miserable crofter Randgar puts my dear Inhild's life in danger! He always seemed a rough character, but I never imagined he would take my daughter from me.

'Thank you for revealing the truth to me. I vow to find my daughter again some day, and we will have all of this foolishness sorted out. I owe you much for your honesty, [placeholder].'
Hwitmon awaits news of your venture with Inhild to Randgar's farm.
Speak to Hwitmon and reveal the truth
Hwitmon can be found at his home within Cliving.\n\nHwitmon awaits news of your venture to Randgar's farm with his daughter, Inhild. You have decided to reveal the truth to him.
